directions: Beat salad dressing, olive oil, vinegar, garlic, Dijon mustard, sugar, pepper, salt, basil, oregano, thyme, and parsley together in a bowl with a whisk until smooth; add pickle juice and stir to thin the dressing to your desired consistency.
ingredients: 1/2 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
2 tablespoons pickle juice, or more to taste
title: Home-Opener Pasta Salad Dressing
